Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies are going to challenge Kerkering, who pitched at four different levels this season before reaching the majors.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orion Kerkering played catch at Citizens Bank Park after being called up 30 minutes before noon Friday.
Kerkering has a real chance to pitch in the postseason for the Phillies.
Kerkering's promotion was felt Friday across the entire organization.
Kerkering heard from a lot of his teammates after the news of his promotion.
Others: The Phillies need to know if Kerkering can handle pitching in the big leagues.
